Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

You create a lash of fire to catch your foes by surprise. Attempt a Deception check against the Perception DC of a creature within your field. A creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to the next attack against it on a success, or all attacks against it on a critical success until the end of your next turn. This counts as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} for the purpose of any benefits you have to Feint actions.

@Check[deception,recitation|against:perception|options:action:feint]
